# Colophon

<img src="/assets/images/colophon.jpg" alt="Metropolis" class="full">

<p class="narrow center">Metropolis by Fritz Lang (1927).</p>

* The favicon is called Boy's surface, an immersion of the real projective plane in three-dimensional space.
* I first published this website in 2024.
* I have stolen at least one design feature from every website on my <a href="/rolls.html#blogroll">blogroll</a>.
* This website is generated by Jekyll and hosted with GitHub Pages.
* You may find (and freely plagiarize) my LaTeX style files <a href="https://github.com/williamrygao/Macros--Packages">here</a>. I think it can produce nice results, however I don't claim to follow anything close to good LaTeX practice. 
* Light mode colours are #3f3341 for text, #c9bbcf for light text, #8e8292 for decoration, #ecebed for background, and #4710a1 for hyperlinks.
* Dark mode colours are #a2a09a for text, #645c31 for light text, #726f5f for decoration, #232323 for background, and #d6be22 for hyperlinks.

---
